mapper.select: SELECT case when count(*) = 0 then 1 else max(billng_header_no) + 1 end as billingHeaderNo FROM billing_headers WHERE payment_method_code = #{paymentMethodCode} and billing_period = #{billingPeriod}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO billing_headers ( tenant_id, billing_period, payment_method_code, billng_header_no, group_code, billing_header_status, factoring_company_code, create_date, totall_billerd_amount, total_received_amount, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{billingPeriod}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{billngHeaderNo}, #{groupCode}, #{billingHeaderStatus}, #{factoringCompanyCode}, #{createDate}, #{totallBillerdAmount}, #{totalReceivedAmount}, #{createdBy} )

INSERT INTO billing_details ( tenant_id, billing_period, payment_method_code, billng_header_no, contract_no, contract_branch_no, premium_due_date, premium_sequence_no, due_date, premium_due_amount, bank_code, bank_branch_code, bank_account_type, bank_account_no, token_no, bank_result_code, card_result_code, other_result_code, name_knj_sei, name_knj_mei, name_kana_sei, name_kana_mei, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{billingPeriod}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{billngHeaderNo}, #{contractNo}, #{contractBranchNo}, #{premiumDueDate}, #{premiumSequenceNo}, #{dueDate}, #{premiumDueAmount}, #{bankCode}, #{bankBranchCode}, #{bankAccountType}, #{bankAccountNo}, #{tokenNo}, #{bankResultCode}, #{cardResultCode}, #{otherResultCode}, #{nameKnjSei}, #{nameKnjMei}, #{nameKanaSei}, #{nameKanaMei}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN max(batch_no) is null THEN 1 ELSE max(batch_no) + 1 END as batch_no FROM deposit_headers WHERE entry_date = #{batchDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deposit_details ( tenant_id, entry_date, batch_no, cash_detail_no, contract_no, contract_branch_no, application_no, due_date, total_premium_amount, deposit_amount, commission_withheld, compensation_tax, clearing_date, suspence_date, delete_date, cash_matching_date, cash_detail_status, payment_result_code, access_id, access_pass, comment, premium_due_date, premium_sequence_no, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{entryDate}, #{batchNo}, #{cashDetailNo}, #{contractNo}, #{contractBranchNo}, #{applicationNo}, #{dueDate}, #{totalPremiumAmount}, #{depositAmount}, #{commissionWithheld}, #{compensationTax}, #{clearingDate}, #{suspenceDate}, #{deleteDate}, #{cashMatchingDate}, #{cashDetailStatus}, #{paymentResultCode}, #{accessId}, #{accessPass}, #{comment}, #{premiumDueDate}, #{premiumSequenceNo}, #{createdBy} )

INSERT INTO deposit_headers ( tenant_id, entry_date, batch_no, payment_method_code, deposit_date, received_amount, batch_total_amount, batch_status, comment, usere_id, collection_route, group_code, created_by ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{entryDate}, #{batchNo}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{depositDate}, #{receivedAmount}, #{batchTotalAmount}, #{batchStatus}, #{comment}, #{usereId}, #{collectionRoute}, #{groupCode}, #{createdBy} )
